data.message: So, what are we waiting for? I am asking out of serious concern for my health. I need to be well. I have to see you. Not gonna wait in hell with ya forever. Looking for an upgrade? Seems you all want me and I want you but the distance is NOT healthy for any of us. Take my hand please. I can't beg a begger. I need a little loot to get some shit done and tie up loose ends. Not much and It will be repaid with intrest in greater things for us all. What more can I say... Your gonna break me and If that is what you are looking for than we can continue down this same broken road of dreams.. I just wanted yo make them reality. Hugz
